Question 32 
 
Vehicular arrival at an isolated intersection follows the Poisson distribution. The mean vehicular arrival 
rate is 2 vehicle per minute. The probability (round off to two decimal places) that at least 2 vehicle will 
arrive in any given 1- minute interval is ______. 
Ans. 
0.27
